name: Blink Blonk
description:
Get out of your basement and go to bed.

[Arrow Keys] or [WASD] to Move
[Space] to Jump
Tap [X] or [J] to Drop Block
Hold [X] or [J] to Get Block
Tap [C] or [K] for Special (requires Power Up)
[F5] and [F6] to Cheat

If the game window is too big for your screen you should be able to zoom out with Ctrl+Mouse Wheel.

Presented by SuperTry

Made for Pursuing Pixels James Jam Game Gam 2022

Music by Joe Kenneally
Game by Kevin Cole

Hugest thanks to Wabbet
